article: after a tense four-hour meeting with president nicolas sarkozy of france , russia 's president , dmitri a. medvedev , announced monday that russia agreed to withdraw its troops by mid-october from its positions in georgia outside the breakaway regions of south ossetia and abkhazia .
abstract: after tense talks russia agrees to limited pullout from georgia
